points.name: ID
points.label: Model ID
points.desc: Model identifier

points.name: L
points.label: Model Length
points.desc: Model length

points.name: AHRtg
points.label: Nameplate Charge Capacity
points.desc: Nameplate charge capacity in amp-hours.

points.name: WHRtg
points.label: Nameplate Energy Capacity
points.desc: Nameplate energy capacity in DC watt-hours.

points.name: WChaRteMax
points.label: Nameplate Max Charge Rate
points.desc: Maximum rate of energy transfer into the storage device in DC watts.

points.name: WDisChaRteMax
points.label: Nameplate Max Discharge Rate
points.desc: Maximum rate of energy transfer out of the storage device in DC watts.

points.name: DisChaRte
points.label: Self Discharge Rate
points.desc: Self discharge rate.  Percentage of capacity (WHRtg) discharged per day.

points.name: SoCMax
points.label: Nameplate Max SoC
points.desc: Manufacturer maximum state of charge, expressed as a percentage.

points.name: SoCMin
points.label: Nameplate Min SoC
points.desc: Manufacturer minimum state of charge, expressed as a percentage.

points.name: SocRsvMax
points.label: Max Reserve Percent
points.desc: Setpoint for maximum reserve for storage as a percentage of the nominal maximum storage.

points.name: SoCRsvMin
points.label: Min Reserve Percent
points.desc: Setpoint for minimum reserve for storage as a percentage of the nominal maximum storage.

points.name: SoC
points.label: State of Charge
points.desc: State of charge, expressed as a percentage.

points.name: DoD
points.label: Depth of Discharge
points.desc: Depth of discharge, expressed as a percentage.

points.name: SoH
points.label: State of Health
points.desc: Percentage of battery life remaining.

points.name: NCyc
points.label: Cycle Count
points.desc: Number of cycles executed in the battery.

points.name: ChaSt
points.label: Charge Status
points.desc: Charge status of storage device. Enumeration.

points.name: LocRemCtl
points.label: Control Mode
points.desc: Battery control mode. Enumeration.

points.name: Hb
points.label: Battery Heartbeat
points.desc: Value is incremented every second with periodic resets to zero.

points.name: CtrlHb
points.label: Controller Heartbeat
points.desc: Value is incremented every second with periodic resets to zero.

points.name: AlmRst
points.label: Alarm Reset
points.desc: Used to reset any latched alarms.  1 = Reset.

points.name: Typ
points.label: Battery Type
points.desc: Type of battery. Enumeration.

points.name: State
points.label: State of the Battery Bank
points.desc: State of the battery bank.  Enumeration.

points.name: StateVnd
points.label: Vendor Battery Bank State
points.desc: Vendor specific battery bank state.  Enumeration.

points.name: WarrDt
points.label: Warranty Date
points.desc: Date the device warranty expires.

points.name: Evt1
points.label: Battery Event 1 Bitfield
points.desc: Alarms and warnings.  Bit flags.

points.name: Evt2
points.label: Battery Event 2 Bitfield
points.desc: Alarms and warnings.  Bit flags.

points.name: EvtVnd1
points.label: Vendor Event Bitfield 1
points.desc: Vendor defined events.

points.name: EvtVnd2
points.label: Vendor Event Bitfield 2
points.desc: Vendor defined events.

points.name: V
points.label: External Battery Voltage
points.desc: DC Bus Voltage.

points.name: VMax
points.label: Max Battery Voltage
points.desc: Instantaneous maximum battery voltage.

points.name: VMin
points.label: Min Battery Voltage
points.desc: Instantaneous minimum battery voltage.

points.name: CellVMax
points.label: Max Cell Voltage
points.desc: Maximum voltage for all cells in the bank.

points.name: CellVMaxStr
points.label: Max Cell Voltage String
points.desc: String containing the cell with maximum voltage.

points.name: CellVMaxMod
points.label: Max Cell Voltage Module
points.desc: Module containing the cell with maximum voltage.

points.name: CellVMin
points.label: Min Cell Voltage
points.desc: Minimum voltage for all cells in the bank.

points.name: CellVMinStr
points.label: Min Cell Voltage String
points.desc: String containing the cell with minimum voltage.

points.name: CellVMinMod
points.label: Min Cell Voltage Module
points.desc: Module containing the cell with minimum voltage.

points.name: CellVAvg
points.label: Average Cell Voltage
points.desc: Average cell voltage for all cells in the bank.

points.name: A
points.label: Total DC Current
points.desc: Total DC current flowing to/from the battery bank.

points.name: AChaMax
points.label: Max Charge Current
points.desc: Instantaneous maximum DC charge current.

points.name: ADisChaMax
points.label: Max Discharge Current
points.desc: Instantaneous maximum DC discharge current.

points.name: W
points.label: Total Power
points.desc: Total power flowing to/from the battery bank.

points.name: ReqInvState
points.label: Inverter State Request
points.desc: Request from battery to start or stop the inverter.  Enumeration.

points.name: ReqW
points.label: Battery Power Request
points.desc: AC Power requested by battery.

points.name: SetOp
points.label: Set Operation
points.desc: Instruct the battery bank to perform an operation such as connecting.  Enumeration.

points.name: SetInvState
points.label: Set Inverter State
points.desc: Set the current state of the inverter.

points.name: AHRtg_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for charge capacity.

points.name: WHRtg_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for energy capacity.

points.name: WChaDisChaMax_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for maximum charge and discharge rate.

points.name: DisChaRte_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for self discharge rate.

points.name: SoC_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for state of charge values.

points.name: DoD_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for depth of discharge.

points.name: SoH_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for state of health.

points.name: V_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for DC bus voltage.

points.name: CellV_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for cell voltage.

points.name: A_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for DC current.

points.name: AMax_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for instantaneous DC charge/discharge current.

points.name: W_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for AC power request.
